Articles.Content: Since it is the time of  Easter, although it has just passed, I'm proposing an Easter egg hunt. It's where you find the various Easter Eggs hidden around the Kerbol system, on moons or planets, or even on parts of a rocket or spaceplane. It's basically where you try to find more easter eggs than another user, and take a screenshot of each easter egg you find. Happy hunting my fellow rocketeers!
Heres and ester egg in gaia (not gonna say were it is)
